title: Why is Ariana Grande always number one even when her songs are really bad? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ariana actually got her first number one not so long ago, as soon as late November, as over the course of her past 4 albums her highest peak was with ‘Problem’ (2014) at #2. However with the release of her latest singles ‘thank u, next’ which is a beautiful breakup song that Ariana mentions in all of her ex-boyfriends; including the late mac miller, this song was Ariana’s first number one followed by her 2019 Mega-Hit “7 Rings” that debuted as well on #1. I see the hate in your question, but the simple answer would be that her songs are getting more recognized and loved in the general public than before. That still DOES NOT mean that these songs are her BEST songs, personally I find that ‘God is a woman’ and ‘Into You’ were one of her best songs yet!
